thread.title: Maine's AJ Lopez Hit a Big Three To Beat NJIT and Then Shushed the Crowd Made Up Entirely of School Children on a Field Trip - NewsBreak
thread.title_full: Maine's AJ Lopez Hit a Big Three To Beat NJIT and Then Shushed the Crowd Made Up Entirely of School Children on a Field Trip - NewsBreak

author: Big Tennessee
title: Maine's AJ Lopez Hit a Big Three To Beat NJIT and Then Shushed the Crowd Made Up Entirely of School Children on a Field Trip - NewsBreak
text:
By Big Tennessee ,
2 hours ago Maine's AJ Lopez is one of my new favorite basketball players. I was actually watching this game — because it was a live sporting event on at 10 a.m. and that rocks — and I was initially stunned to see so many people in the crowd before finding out there were like 20 school groups there on a field trip. I didn't know weekday morning college basketball games two weeks into the spring semester were acceptable field trips, but I guess we just figure the kids are all using AI to cheat on everything anyway, so what's the point. Read full article
Read in NewsBreak
